## hpr3801 :: Enter the gopher

 If you would like to talk about gopher on Mastodon, I'm
@screwtape@mastodon.sdf.org (and I have a weekly aNONradio
show about gopher)

floodgap link
https://gopher.floodgap.com
Web proxy to menu with ascii art
https://gopher.floodgap.com/gopher/gw.lite?=gopher.club+70+312f75736572732f78696c65642f
Get on a tilde:
https://sdf.org
https://tildeverse.org

    $ ssh username@tty.sdf.org # Following sdf.org 's instructions
    $ # Some good gophers to browse
    $ lynx gopher://gopher.club
    $ lynx gopher://tildeverse.org
    $ lynx gopher://floodgap.com

You might have to
apt install lynx
or
pkg_add lynx
or etc.
sdf.org:
$ mkgopher
https://phlogosphere.org or
tilde.institute tilde (for example):
$ man burrow # how to use burrow
https://wiki.tilde.institute/w/gopher
Gopher standard!
https://rfc-editor.org/info/rfc1436
Mastodon: @albatross@sdf.org
elpher-mode
https://elpa.nongnu.org/nongnu/doc/elpher.html
https://mastodon.sdf.org/@screwtape/109334057925655327
phetch
https://github.com/xvxx/phetch
overbite
https://gopher.floodgap.com/overbite/
proxy to floodgap
https://gopher.floodgap.com/gopher/
Cool gophers:

gopher://tilde.institute/1/~screwtape/
gopher://gopher.club/1/users/nm03
gopher://linkerror.com
gopher://gopher.black
gopher://i-logout.cz/1/bongusta

(Very) Advanced! Self-hosting tls gopher:
gophernicus (+ reference to stunnel4)
https://github.com/gophernicus/gophernicus
